newsitem.title: SINGAPORE: India awards three VLCC Qua Iboe in Dec oil tender.
newsitem.headline: India awards three VLCC Qua Iboe in Dec oil tender.

text.p: India awarded three very large crude carriers (VLCC) of Qua Iboe crude in its December tender, in addition to the four Dubai cargos already reported, industry sources said on Monday.
Mobil Corp were awarded two VLCCs on a delivered basis at Dated Brent plus $1.1694 per barrel, industry sources confirmed.
Trader Glencore was awarded one VLCC, also on a delivered basis, at plus $1.2795 per barrel, industry sources confirmed.
As reported on Friday, India awarded four Dubai cargoes.

Two were taken from Phibro at first-half month quotes plus 57 and 58 cents. One was taken from Total SA at 57 cents and another from Norwegian state oil firm Statoil at 59 cents, both over first-half month quotes.
The tender closed on Thursday and offers were valid until the following day.
